sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Post } from "../../../types/blog.type"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { addPost } from "../../blog.reducer"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { RootState } from "../../../store"; const CreatePost = () => { const initialPost: Post = { description: '', featuredImage: '', id: '', publishDate: '', published: false, title: '' }; const [form , setForm] = useState(initialPost); const editPost = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.MyBlog.editPost) const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { if(editPost) { setForm(editPost) } }, [editPost]) const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); const postWithId = {...form, id: new Date().toISOString} dispatch(addPost(form)) setForm(initialPost) }; return (
(setForm(pre => ({...pre, title: e.target.value})))} />
(setForm(pre => ({...pre, featuredImage: e.target.value})))} />
